attributes.name: opened
attributes.description: True when the configuration panel is opened.

attributes.name: selectedState
attributes.description:
Currently selected state's index in the `states` array.
Change dispatches `state-changed` custom event.

attributes.name: dark
attributes.description: When set it renders the component in dark theme.

properties.name: opened
properties.description: True when the configuration panel is opened.

properties.name: states
properties.description:
The list of general style states for the element.
It renders list of tabs with labels from this array.

properties.name: selectedState
properties.description:
Currently selected state's index in the `states` array.
Change dispatches `state-changed` custom event.

properties.name: dark
properties.description: When set it renders the component in dark theme.

events.name: state-changed
events.description: An event dispatched when selected demo state change
